title: ComplyTime Node Metadata Standard
description: Standard metadata requirements for ComplyTime CALM architecture nodes. Enforces consistent documentation of primary function, context, data contracts, and Gemara layer information.

primary_function.description: Primary function or purpose of the node (e.g., 'Policy Authoring & MCP Server Host', 'OTEL Processor')

gemara_layer.description: Gemara layer(s) this node operates at (e.g., 'Layer 1: Guidance, Layer 2: Controls, Layer 3: Policy')
